## Inline

{:js}

`const getStringLength = (str) => str.length;{:js}`

{:html}

`<div class="foo">bar</div>{:html}`

.support

`getStringLength{:.support}`

Escape

- `<div class="foo">bar</div>\{:html}`
- `<div class="foo">bar</div>\\{:html}`
- `<div class="foo">bar</div>\\\{:html}`
- `<div class="foo">bar</div>{:unsupportedlang}`
- `<div class="foo">bar</div>\{:unsupportedlang}`
